title: Ep 90 | Phil's Secret Bunker, the Duck Dynasty Prayer That Didn't Make the Cut & Jase's Jelly Issue
description:
Jase is shocked when Phil reveals his secret jelly stash, and Al laughs till he cries over Jase and Phil's jelly shenanigans. Jase experiences one of the top 10 most shocking things he's ever seen a human being do. The guys talk miracles. And Phil remembers the time he sent a not-so-subtle message to the "Duck Dynasty" film crew with his prayer at the end of the episode.

https://BlackRifleCoffee.com/PHIL 

https://HomeTitleLock.com Enter Code PHIL
